text: Pen tap yepɨs agnepal okok, kɨlop tap yɨpɨl pak sɨbogɨpal ak ñɨŋɨnɨgun akaŋ ma ñɨŋɨnɨgun agɨl yɨp agnepɨm. Takaw anɨb ak, nɨbop pen agɨnɨgebin. Nɨbi ogɨnap apɨm, Chɨn mɨdupsek binɨb gos nɨgep mɨdobun apɨm. Takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd apɨm ak pen, binɨb gos nɨgep mɨdebal okok, yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanɨl, chɨn binɨb awl yɨbɨl mɨdobun agɨl nepal. Binɨb pen mapen lep mɨdebal okok, kɨli anɨgel, mapen lep anɨb ak binɨb kɨlop gek, gos sek mɨdɨl kɨles gɨl jak tep gɨl mɨdebal.
